txt.en:
'The Zhélruka have need of your assistance in the ongoing efforts to reclaim Gundabad.

'I ask you to complete a series of missions in Gundabad. Assist Scout-master Ausma and Hórin where you can, then report back to me.

'I know that Prince Ingór and I can count on you!'
Zóva can be found at Vérnozal in Máttugard.\n\nYou should talk to Zóva.
Scout-master Ausma and Hórin can both be found at Vérnozal in Máttugard.\n\nYou should complete Gundabad Missions with Scout-master Ausma and Hórin.
The Dwarves of Gundabad have need of your assistance in the ongoing efforts to reclaim their rightful Mountain-home.

'I see that you have completed many missions in Gundabad since last we spoke.\n\n'You have done well to aid the Zhélruka, and all those who work to reclaim the Mountain-home! I reward for your efforts, [placeholder].'
